meanings.sent1: She is eschewing unhealthy snacks to stay fit.

meanings.sent3: The cat is eschewing the new catnip toy, preferring the old one.

meanings.definition: Refraining from or abstaining from something
meanings.sent1: The eschewing student chose not to participate in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Her eschewing attitude towards gossip kept her out of trouble.
meanings.sent3: The eschewing cake on the table looked tempting but untouched.
meanings.sent4: His eschewing behavior at the party made him stand out from the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The eschewing monk lived a simple life, free from worldly desires.
